description: bridge with arches at middle; horse and figures at water's edge in foreground; buildings in URC
provenance: [Eric G. Carlson, New York, until 1995; sold in July for SLT with preparatory drawing of same title, to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (1995-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: LRC, in the print: [A LEPÈRE 1902]; ULC, in the print: [L\'Abreuvoir (flower) PARIS / AU PONT-MARIE]
title: L'Abreuvoir au Pont Marie
